alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 10:56AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Gulf, Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southern Leon and Franklin Counties through 1145 AM EST/1045 AM CST/... At 1055 AM EST/955 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Crawfordville to 7 miles east of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Woodville, Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Beverly and Poplar Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
